text.div:
This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/appointment-cancellation-reason defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
deleted DeletedAppointment was either logically deleted or physically deleted
rescheduled RescheduledAppointment was rescheduled

name: AppointmentCancellationReasonCodeSystem
title: Appointment Cancellation Reason Codes
description: Extended reasons for the cancellation of an appointment

concept.definition: Appointment was either logically deleted or physically deleted
